column5: Ha! I'd like to say this is a fake, but look how forgiving the fairways are.  Perfect for a Leaf.
Prepping dion for a 400 yard drive
He should take a 400 mile drive south and go join another team. I'll take a bag of pucks or golf balls for him as long as he takes his contract with him.
And Vesa Toskala would be waiting on the green, ready for the ball to bounce past him.
The pack a day of smokes he goes through really helps I'm sure.
does anyone have any solid proof of this? seen it come up in another post as well! just curious.
I wonder if dion has a middle ear infection? He has no balance. He falls more than the peewees i coached. It would explain his wild shot too.
http://youtu.be/dry6bqzZbFc   If Hitler was a Leaf Fan.....
